attributes.background:
It has recently been aired on BBC television news that a cancer patient who purchased their own drugs was told that the NHS would no longer treat them.
This is grossly unfair esspecially as the new drugs may well have extended the patients life. (BBC Look East Monday 2nd of June 2008)we the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ask the NHS to continue to treat patients when the NHS refuse to fund medication deemed to expensive and when the patient offers/decides to fund the medication themselves. as this petition has been rejected I now intend to take this matter to the national press including the BBC who broard cast the issue orriginally.
